stimulusHtml: Using the same amount of time and resources, Jack can assemble either 10 bikes or 5 computers, whereas Sam can assemble either 5 bikes or 5 computers. Based on the data, which of the following statements is correct?
choicesHtml: Sam has an absolute advantage in assembling bikes.
Sam has an absolute advantage in assembling computers.
Sam has a comparative advantage in assembling bikes.
Jack has a comparative advantage in assembling bikes.
Jack has a comparative advantage in assembling both bikes and computers.
